'''''Amon Hen'' 260''' is the two-hundred-and-sixtieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in July [[2016]].

==Contents==

* Cover: ''[[Melian]]''
** By: [[Soni Alcorn-Hender]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Artwork: ''[[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] smoking''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Rath Dínen: [[John Ellison|John Archdall Ellison]]
** By: [[Charles Noad]]
* The Burning [[Palantíri|Palantír]] 20
** By: Ian Collier
* All Brân
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* Report: Inaugural East Yorkshire Tolkien Tour
** By: Michael Flowers
* Report: Of Angels, Associations and Ankles
** By: Mike & Maggie Percival
* Death to [[Bree]] Creek Quadrangle
** By: [[Kristine Larsen]]
* The Tragedy of [[Arvedui]] and its Relevant to ''[[The Lord of the Rings|LotR]]'' Part 1
** By: Angela Nicholas
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Ian Collier
* Letters
* News From [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Mathom
** By: Jan Boom
* Three Farthing Stone Anniversary Meeting
** By: Liz Stephen
* Michael's Miscellany
** By: Michael Flowers
* New Members
* Artwork: ''[[Mordor]]''
** By: Soni Alcorn-Hender
* Committee
